name: Yärk!
description:
More fixes!

No more infinite rope climbing.

zooming camera won't clip through the floor anymore.

Mimi shouldn't eat the bag any more, and if he does spit it out!

All Treasure is pickable now.

Lots of minor fixes and tweaks.

Changes:

Zooming can now only be done when standing still.

Enjoy and leave some feedback!

Cover art by the talented Ronnie Jarrad go them check out at @RonDangerSolo
